title: dEvasEnApatiyai tudi
sahitya:
dEvasEnApatiyai tudi manamE kAvalanai vElavanai kanda kaDambanai


anupallavi

  naval pugala tagumO avan pugazhai navinrAl nalgumE nilaiyAna mOnamE


caraNam    vElai piDittavanin kAlai piDippadenam vElai enreNNAdu kAlam kazhippadO
NALai varum enru nambiyiruppadO annALE innAL enru ninaindu amaidiyuDan
